value.title: Transition from Excel to Power BI
value.excerpt: Microsoft's Power BI combines the Power Query's extraction, transformation, and loading capabilities with DAX and a relational data model in a new application with new features.

value.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
value.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

value.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Create and manage a Power BI deployment pipeline
value.excerpt: The deployment pipelines tool enables Power BI creators to manage the development lifecycle of organizational content.

value.title: Configure Power BI report filters
value.excerpt: Report filtering is a complex topic because many techniques are available for filtering a Microsoft Power BI report. However, with complexity comes control, allowing you to design reports that meet requirements and expectations.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

value.title: Use tools to optimize Power BI performance
value.excerpt: Use tools to develop, manage, and optimize Power BI data model and DAX query performance.

value.title: Change The Font  Across All Visuals in a Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly change all the text in Power BI with the theme options in Power BI

value.title: DAX Table Functions: ALL, FILTER, & VALUES
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate DAX Table functions in Power BI with real world scenarios. Also learn how to quickly add these functions in to dynamic calculations in DAX.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code. value.title: Avoid refresh errors with missing columns in Power BI/Power Query
